name: Ultimate Jet Boat Experience
description: Experience the thrill of the Ultimate Jet Boat Ride at Airlie Beach, where adventure meets stunning scenery. This high-adrenaline tour is perfect for thrill-seekers and families looking for an unforgettable experience. Feel the rush as you zoom past the Coral Sea Marina & Resort, performing exhilarating 360 and 180-degree spins, power stops, and drifts. Marvel at the breathtaking views of the Whitsundays and keep an eye out for local wildlife like sea turtles, dugongs, and stingrays. With funny and informative onboard commentary, this tour guarantees laughter and excitement, making it the highlight of your stay in Airlie Beach.
departure_times: Choice of morning or afternoon departure
includes:
30 min Jetboat ride around Pioneer Bay
Lifejackets and Spray jackets
Spray glasses
Lock boxes/small luggage storage
Funny and informative commentary
FREE GoPro photos
highlights:
30 min Jetboat ride around Pioneer Bay from Airlie Beach
The ultimate mix of laughter, water & adrenaline
Experience daring stunts including 180 and 360 turns, power stops and drifts
Spot wildlife like turtles, dugongs, and stingrays around the bay
Free photos available on our Facebook page
No experience necessary: suitable for all ages (over 5) and abilities
ideal_for: Thrill-seekers, families, and adventure enthusiasts looking for a high-adrenaline experience in Airlie Beach.

name: Bottoms Up Sunset Boat Tour
description: Cruise into the sunset aboard Bottoms Up, a relaxing and scenic journey around Shute Harbour. This unique one-hour evening tour offers an immersive experience into the nocturnal world of marine life, unveiling the hidden wonders of the Whitsundays after dark. Perfect for those seeking a tranquil yet thrilling adventure, this tour is ideal for nature enthusiasts and anyone looking to experience the Great Barrier Reef in a new light.
includes:
Glass bottom boat tour
Sunset cruise
Immersive experience into the nocturnal marine life
highlights:
Experience the sunset over Shute Harbour
Explore the nocturnal marine life of the Whitsundays
Relaxing and scenic cruise
Unique adventure after dark
Perfect for nature enthusiasts
ideal_for: Nature enthusiasts, couples, and families looking for a unique sunset experience

name: Bottoms Up Sunset Boat Tours
description: Experience the magic of the Whitsundays at sunset aboard the Bottoms Up Sunset Boat Tour. This family-friendly adventure offers a relaxing and memorable outing for everyone, from infants to adults. Enjoy stunning views of coral and marine life as you unwind with a drink from our fully licensed onboard bar. Ideal for families and nature enthusiasts, this tour is a perfect way to cap off a day with breathtaking natural beauty and tranquility.
includes:
1.5 Hour guided Sunset and coral viewing tour
Courtesy bus pick up from selected hotels
Licenced bar on board
Light snacks including crackers, dips, deli meats, cheese, and fruit
highlights:
Guided Sunset and coral viewing tour
Family-friendly experience
Complimentary bus pick-up from selected hotels
Fully licensed onboard bar
Light snacks provided
menu: **Menu:** Light snacks including crackers, dips, deli meats, cheese, and fruit
ideal_for: Families, couples, and nature enthusiasts seeking a relaxing and scenic experience

name: Ultimate Jet Boat Experience
description: Buckle up for a splash-tactic adventure with the Ultimate Jet Boat Experience, one of Australia’s most exhilarating boat rides. Powered by a jaw-dropping 800 horsepower, this tour zips you right into the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park in just 30 heart-pounding minutes. Perfect for thrill-seekers and marine enthusiasts, this experience offers a unique blend of adventure and education. After the thrilling ride, explore Daydream Island and enjoy a hands-on marine experience with a marine biologist. Ideal for those looking for a mix of adrenaline and discovery.
includes:
Living Reef marine experience
Spray jackets (if needed)
Dry bag for your phone and wallet
highlights:
Exhilarating jet boat ride to Daydream Island
Experience the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park
Meet a marine biologist for an educational session
Explore the vibrant marine life up close
45 minutes of free time on Daydream Island
ideal_for: Thrill-seekers, marine enthusiasts, and families with children over 5 years old

name: Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat Tour
description: Join us on the 'Bottoms Up', a custom-made glass bottom boat, for a unique exploration of Airlie Beach’s vibrant coral reefs. This tour offers an immersive experience of the Great Barrier Reef's diverse ecosystems without getting wet. Perfect for families, solo travelers, and friends, you'll enjoy a guided journey through the beautiful Whitsunday islands, complete with informative commentary and a bonus photo stop at Lions Lookout.
includes:
70 Minute Guided Glass Bottom Boat Discovery Tour
Funny and Informative Commentary About The Reef
Life Jackets For Minors
Bonus photo stop at Lions Lookout
Courtesy transfers from selected locations
highlights:
Unique Glass Bottom Boat experience
Explore Airlie Beach's coral reefs
Informative commentary about the reef
Photo stop at Lions Lookout
Ideal for all age groups
Opportunity to view a wide variety of marine life
Fully shaded vessel
Licensed bar onboard
ideal_for: Families, solo travelers, and friends looking to explore the reef in a unique and comfortable way.

name: Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat Tour
description: Join us for the Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat Tour, a unique adventure that lets you explore the spectacular coral reefs of the Whitsundays without getting wet. This tour is perfect for families, friends, or solo travelers who want to experience the vibrant marine life up close. Cruise through the idyllic islands and marvel at the colorful spectrum of hard and soft corals, fish, and other marine life. The tour also includes a photo opportunity stop at Lions Lookout, offering stunning views over the harbour and Whitsunday islands.
includes:
70 Minute Guided Glass Bottom Boat Discovery Tour
Funny and Informative Commentary About The Reef
Life Jackets For Minors
Bonus photo stop at Lions Lookout
Courtesy transfers from selected locations
highlights:
Unique glass bottom boat experience
Explore the Great Barrier Reef's diverse ecosystems
View vibrant hard & soft corals, fish & marine life
Photo opportunity at Lions Lookout
Suitable for all age groups
ideal_for: Families, friends, solo travelers, and anyone interested in marine life and coral reef exploration.

name: Bottoms Up Night Boat Tour
description: Embark on a captivating evening adventure with the Bottoms Up Night Boat Tour. Perfect for families, couples, and anyone eager to explore the vibrant nocturnal life of the reef, this 60-minute tour offers an unforgettable experience. Witness the stunning underwater world come alive under the glow of UV lights as you glide over the reef flats. With guided commentary, you'll learn about the diverse ecosystem that thrives in the Great Barrier Reef. Enjoy the unique opportunity to spot crayfish, turtles, octopuses, and even sharks in their natural habitat. Relax and enjoy the onboard licensed bar while soaking in the serene beauty of the Shute Harbour surroundings.
includes:
Courtesy bus pick up
Licenced bar on board
Guided and informative commentary about the reef
Underwater UV lights for optimum viewing
highlights:
60-minute evening tour exploring the reefs
Spot underwater wildlife like crayfish, turtles, octopuses, and sharks
Guided and commentated tour
Unique underwater UV light viewing
Relaxing cruise around Shute Harbour
ideal_for: Families, couples, and nature enthusiasts interested in exploring the nocturnal marine life of the Great Barrier Reef.
